employmentEarningsHours.typeOfWork: Intelligence operative and field agent for covert operations supporting resistance activities and strategic planning missions

remarks.remarks: Currently employed veteran with ongoing service to intelligence operations. Has middle name. Demonstrates currently employed scenario where no employment ending date is provided.
